TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract UCOMIConnectionPoint

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obtener más información, consulte la documentación existente para `IConnectionPoint` en la subcarpeta com de MSDN library.For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPoint` in the com subfolder of the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Advise (object pUnkSink, out int pdwCookie);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Advise(object pUnkSink, [out] int32& pdwCookie) cil managed
Public Sub Advise (pUnkSink As Object, ByRef pdwCookie As Integer)
public: void Advise(System::Object ^ pUnkSink, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] int % pdwCookie);

param.name: pUnkSink
param.span: Referencia al receptor para que reciba las llamadas para la interfaz de salida administrada por este punto de conexión.

span.span: Reference to the sink to receive calls for the outgoing interface managed by this connection point.

param.name: pdwCookie
param.span: Contiene la cookie de conexión, si la devolución es correcta.

span.span: On successful return, contains the connection cookie.

summary.span: Establece una conexión de consulta entre el punto de conexión y el objeto receptor del llamador.

span.span: Establishes an advisory connection between the connection point and the caller's sink object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obtener más información, consulte la documentación existente sobre `IConnectionPoint::Advise` en MSDN library.For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPoint::Advise` in the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: public void EnumConnections (out System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIEnumConnections ppEnum);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void EnumConnections([out] class System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIEnumConnections& ppEnum) cil managed
Public Sub EnumConnections (ByRef ppEnum As UCOMIEnumConnections)
public: void EnumConnections([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Runtime::InteropServices::UCOMIEnumConnections ^ % ppEnum);

param.name: ppEnum
param.span: Contiene el enumerador recién creado, si la devolución es correcta.

span.span: On successful return, contains the newly created enumerator.

summary.span: Crea un objeto enumerador para recorrer en iteración las conexiones que existen a este punto de conexión.

span.span: Creates an enumerator object for iteration through the connections that exist to this connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obtener más información, consulte la documentación existente sobre `IConnectionPoint::EnumConnections` en MSDN library.For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPoint::EnumConnections` in the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetConnectionInterface (out Guid pIID);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetConnectionInterface([out] valuetype System.Guid& pIID) cil managed
Public Sub GetConnectionInterface (ByRef pIID As Guid)
public: void GetConnectionInterface([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] Guid % pIID);

param.name: pIID
param.span: Contiene el IID de la interfaz de salida administrada por este punto de conexión, si la devolución es correcta.

span.span: On successful return, contains the IID of the outgoing interface managed by this connection point.

summary.span: Devuelve el IID de la interfaz de salida administrada por este punto de conexión.

span.span: Returns the IID of the outgoing interface managed by this connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obtener más información, consulte la documentación existente sobre `IConnectionPoint::GetConnectionInterface` en MSDN library.For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPoint::GetConnectionInterface` in the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetConnectionPointContainer (out System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIConnectionPointContainer ppCPC);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetConnectionPointContainer([out] class System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIConnectionPointContainer& ppCPC) cil managed
Public Sub GetConnectionPointContainer (ByRef ppCPC As UCOMIConnectionPointContainer)
public: void GetConnectionPointContainer([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Runtime::InteropServices::UCOMIConnectionPointContainer ^ % ppCPC);

param.name: ppCPC
param.span: Contiene la interfaz del objeto conectable, si la devolución es correcta.

span.span: On successful return, contains the connectable object's interface.

summary.span: Recupera el puntero de interfaz al objeto conectable que, conceptualmente, posee este punto de conexión.

span.span: Retrieves the interface pointer to the connectable object that conceptually owns this connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obtener más información, consulte la documentación existente sobre `IConnectionPoint::GetConnectionPointContainer` en MSDN library.For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPoint::GetConnectionPointContainer` in the MSDN library.
